bodyText:
TO SAY THAT GANNI FOUNDERS DITTE & NICOLAJ LOVE A PARTY WOULD BE AN UNDERSTATEMENT. 

AFTER ALL THAT IS WHERE THEY MET 18 YEARS AGO. 

FIND OUT MORE ABOUT DITTE'S INSPIRATION BEHIND OUR PS22 COLLECTION 

AND GET NOSTALGIC FOR WHEN WE CAN FINALLY PARTY AGAIN

WE CAN'T WAIT TO SEE YOU ALL ON THE DANCEFLOOR FOR NEVER-ENDING DANCING  <3
headline: MEET DITTE AT THE AFTERPARTY
